overview: A diverse range of fantasies; gourmet erotica, a seductive femme fatale, and three short films from Guest Directors. Also included are the stories of a dirty doctor and a motorcycle hitchhiker; circus performers, interpretive dancers and witches; and an ode to the ultimate emancipation, female ejaculation. Included: A Lethal Femme Fatale; Dirty Doctor; The Bitchhiker; Meow Kittens Orgy; Somos Solo Cuerpo; Circus Aerius Perversus; Carne; Female Ejaculation; Horny Beasts; I Put a Pagan Spell On You.
title: XConfessions 7
